TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BatchRequestReplacementInterceptHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub BatchRequestReplacementInterceptHandler(ByRef request As IBatchRequest)
type BatchRequestReplacementInterceptHandler = delegate of IBatchRequest -> unit

Docs.param: The parameters of the request being intercepted.
Docs.summary: Represents a method that intercepts a request to the Batch service in order to replace the parameters and/or operation context.
